result.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا وَقَدۡ بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِبَرِ عِتِيّٗا
result.translation: 8. Nabii Zakariyya diggah qajjibsitak yi-Rabbow baxa geyam mannal yoh takkeeh yi-barra maxalaytoy xale waytah anuk, kaadu anu nummah kaxxiinaa kee idoolannuh arac yoofee numuh anuk iyye.
